00029 #include "AbstractOdeSystem.hpp"
00030 #include "Exception.hpp"
00031 
00032 AbstractOdeSystem::AbstractOdeSystem(unsigned numberOfStateVariables)
00033     : AbstractParameterisedSystem<std::vector<double> >(numberOfStateVariables),
00034       mUseAnalyticJacobian(false)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 AbstractOdeSystem::~AbstractOdeSystem()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool AbstractOdeSystem::CalculateStoppingEvent(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY)
00043 {
00044     return false;
00045 }
00046 
00047 double AbstractOdeSystem::CalculateRootFunction(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY)
00048 {
00049     bool stop = CalculateStoppingEvent(time, rY);
00050     return stop ? 0.0 : 1.0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool AbstractOdeSystem::GetUseAnalyticJacobian()
00054 {
00055     return mUseAnalyticJacobian;
00056 }
00057 
00058 const std::vector<double>& AbstractOdeSystem::rGetConstStateVariables() const
00059 {
00060     return mStateVariables;
00061 }
